dialog.attr1: No... It can't end like this.
Check your data! You've got the wrong ship!
You've got the wrong bounty! I just bought this ship!
I'm innocent. I didn't do anything!
I'm being framed! I don't want to die for something I didn't do!
Guess my bounty will just get bigger when I space you.
You the bounty hunter they sent? Thought I'd get someone better...
You think you can take me? You'll regret it.
I've got friends! Think it over.
Just let me leave, you'll never see me again. Please.
Please don't... I have a family.
I know I messed up... but I don't deserve to die.
